text: Kristen Bell has never released any wedding photos, until now. The actress sat down with ` ` CBS Sunday Morning'' and gave viewers the first - ever glimpse into her 2013 wedding to actor, Dax Shepard. ` ` We got married in a tiny room in the Beverly Hills courthouse, and it was still one of the best days of my life,'' she said. Bell shared three photos from their wedding day. One shows them exchanging vows with Bell visibly emotional. Another photo is of Bell and Shepard signing their marriage license. A third photo shows the newlyweds sealing their ceremony with a kiss.
